name: Where is Santa?
description: The New year is soon. Santa Claus is in a hurry to please all the people with gifts, but what to do if he suddenly loses one of his most loyal friends...? “Where is Santa” is a simple 2D survival simulator in which your main task is to collect items and pass a variety of obstacles. In this game you go through a variety of levels, playing for the reindeer, who lost Santa Claus. At each level there are four subjects, collecting those, you can go to the next level. But be careful, on your way there is a set of various obstacles, such as sharp icicles and bewitched, bloodthirsty snowmen, but in general they should not make you special work. Be careful, think about your every step and you will be able to help the deer find its owner.
